title: Change announcer voice to another language
body:
I would like the announcer voice to be Russian and text to be English. Is this possible?
I tried changing the language and it works however all text is in Russian and I don't want to type in Russian to find my champion in champ select. Is there anyway to have Russian sound pack and English text? 

Please and thank you <3

replies.body: Since Russian isn't listed as an available language on the NA servers, I'm not sure that you'll be able to have English text and Russian voices =\ .
